title: HARSHER PENALTIES FOR DODGING Q'S
body: just stop it, cant ranked without running around champ select four to five times. Just stop it, 5mins is garbage.

replies.body:
Would you rather have to sit through a couple of q dodges, or get into a game where one of your team wont be able to commit to (and you can't /remake)?

Would you rather sit through a game where the enemy team has a far superior team comp and no matter how well your team plays you still get stomped? 

Would you rather get into a game with a player on your team playing teemo jg with a 30% win rate over ~100 games? 

Or a teammate with 100000000 ping, or a game where everybody is already fighting in champ select? 

Probably not. There are [so many reasons that people dodge](https://www.reddit.com/r/summonerschool/comments/3bgid8/queue_dodging_when_is_it_worth_it/), and a lot of them are legit. Even I dodge at least once a day so that I only lose 3 LP instead of 17. If they repeatedly dodge queues, the time [stacks up quite quickly](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging). It's pretty generous of Riot to allow us 1 "get out of jail free" card in the form of a dodge, so stop complaining about people using theirs. I'm sure you've probably done it a couple of times as well.
